author: ghudson
msg: Allow the client to escape an auth request using an empty mechanism.
The client doesn't do this yet, but there may be pressure to change
that in order to allow partially authorized checkouts.
* libsvn_ra_svn/protocol: Document the escape mechanism.
* svnserve/serve.c
(auth_request): Quit out if an empty mech is received.  Document
that the caller shouldn't assume that the required access level was
achieved.
(must_have_write_access): Check access level after auth request.
(serve): Check access level after auth request.

author: fitz
msg: The use of the word "switch" after each switch (e.g. -u switch) could
be misconstrued to imply that the switch takes an argument.  It also
clutters up the text unnecessarily.  Remove it.
Patch by: John R. Daily <jdaily@progeny.com>
* doc/book/book/appa.xml: Be consistent.

author: fitz
msg: Assuming "svn help list" is accurate, the output does not include a
column indicating the presence of properties; remove that from the
book.
While we're at it, change "updated" to "modified", since we're talking
about changes on the server, not in the working copy.
Patch by: John R. Daily <jdaily@progeny.com>
* doc/book/book/ch03.xml: Update docs.

author: clkao
msg: Merge from local for minor perl bindings fixes.
* swig/svn_ra.i: Correctly wrap the output of ra->get_repos_root.
* swig/perl/Fs.pm:
Add get_uuid and set_uuid as fs methods.
Add abort as a fs_txn method.
Follow API change introduced in r7635 (nuke delete_tree and rename).
* swig/perl/Ra.pm:
Add missing 'require SVN::Core' in the SVN::Ra synopsis.
For the record, this auto merge commit is done by:
svk merge -a //svn/local //svn/trunk

author: fitz
msg: Undo earlier search/replace error from rename of sample project
"write" to project "calc".
Patch by: John R. Daily <jdaily@progeny.com>
* doc/book/book/ch04.xml: Fix silly mistake.
